recipesJson.name: Lolly Gobble Ice Cream
recipesJson.author: wadeyloops
recipesJson.description:
VT Salted caramel is Salted Caramel Fantasy
Lolly Gobble Bliss Bombs are the Aussie version of the American Cracker Jack.
The cone is CBW and FW Waffle cone and Caramel Rice Crispy Treats,
The ice cream is a FA and WF Vanilla Ice cream combo filled in with a touch of PUR Butter Pecan Praline Ice Cream for a little more nuttiness.
The blended topping is WF Caramel Popcorn and Peanuts, FLV Popcorn and tied together with the some Salted Caramel Fantasy.
Enjoy, at least 7 days steep.
